summary:
**2023-24 College Football Playoff Summary**

The 2023-24 College Football Playoff was a tournament to find the best college football team. The top four teams played in two semifinal games: Michigan beat Alabama, and Washington beat Texas. These winners then played in the championship game, where Michigan won 34-13, claiming their first title since 1997. This was the last year with just four teams; next year, the playoff expands to 12 teams. The games were shown on ESPN and attracted many viewers.
